name: Miner Fred
description: Located in the main square. Sells various pickaxes that allow you to mine higher tier rocks. Essential for progression.

name: Greedy Cey
description: Trades your collected ores, runes, and essences for gold. Main source of income from mining.

name: Maria
description: Runs the potion shop. Essential for healing during combat and exploration.

name: Bard
description: Sells lanterns needed for lighting in The Cave. Essential for deeper mining expeditions.

name: Marbles
description: Purchases your crafted weapons and equipment. Good way to earn gold from your forging work.

name: Wizard
description: The most important NPC. Allows you to reroll your race and unlock new worlds like Forgotten Kingdom.

name: Sensei Moro
description: Provides advanced quests and guides. Complete his questline to unlock World 2 (Forgotten Kingdom).

name: Enhancer
description: Consumes resources to add enhancement slots to your equipment. Required before adding runes.

name: Runemaker
description: Embeds runes into your enhanced equipment. Runes provide special effects like burn, poison, lifesteal.
